tweets.text: I don’t want to hear a single word from Colorado lawmakers and law enforcement until we’re talking about what we’re doing to fix our gun problem. No what our plan is, not what we could do or what we should do. Shut the fuck up and make a change.

We have to solve the mass shooting epidemic. We — especially our students — should all feel safe in our communities. I’m praying for the students and families from STEM School Highlands Rach, and will not rest until we deliver common-sense gun reform.
